member.name: T:Butler.Register.ServiceRegistrationMode
member.summary: A set of different service registration modes.

member.name: F:Butler.Register.ServiceRegistrationMode.Default
member.summary: Denotes that an exception should be thrown if a service registration already exists for the specified service type.

member.name: F:Butler.Register.ServiceRegistrationMode.Replace
member.summary: Denotes that the existing service registration should be replaced with the new.

member.name: F:Butler.Register.ServiceRegistrationMode.Ignore
member.summary: Denotes that the existing service registration should be kept and the new service registration should be dropped without registering.
